biography: Natalis Chan Pak-Cheung (陳百祥), born 3 December 1950 in Hong Kong, is a Hong Kong television host, film actor and producer. Besides his duties as a variety show host, he has also been a horse racing commentator and horse trainer. In total, his horses have won 54 races, including the hard to achieve triple-trifecta six times.
name: Natalis Chan
place_of_birth: Hong Kong, British Crown Colony [now China]
